sentences: Treener võttis mängu jooksul kaks korda aja maha.
Meil on palju aega enne kohtumist.
Sellel ajal oli väga hea ilm.
context: 'Aega' is the partitive singular form of the Estonian noun 'aeg', meaning 'time'. In this case, it functions as an object in sentences and often appears with verbs that measure or take time. It can refer to a duration of time, a specific hour, or an occasion/period when something happens.
